contents.Text: Use: Gain 10 Intellect for the next 10 fights.
Launches three Arcane Missiles at the enemy, causing
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 1.3, 1)
damage with each one of them totalling to
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 1.3, 3)
damage.
Caster's Arcane Mastery provides
Chance(Effector, Arcane Mastery, 10)
chance to launch additional Arcane Missiles.
This ability ends caster's turn.
Every time the enemy casts an ability you retaliate with a bolt of frost, causing
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 2.9, 1)
damage.
Corrupts the target, causing
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 0.8, 1)
damage each turn for 5 turns.
Curses the target with agony, causing
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 0.9, 1)
damage each turn for 10 turns.
This ability ends caster's turn.
Hurls a fiery ball at the target, dealing
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, #1, 1)
damage.
Hurls a fiery ball that causes
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 1.1, 1)
damage.
This ability ends caster's turn.
At the beginning of the combat, hurls a fiery ball at the enemy that causes
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 2.0, 1)
damage.
After collecting at least 3 of any resource gain the Foresight buff for 3 turns. Every time the enemy collects at least a single resource you gain 1 unit of the resource that the enemy collected.
Buff received does not stack.

damage.

damage.
This ability ends caster's turn.

PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 1.3, 1)
damage with each one of them totalling to

damage.

Chance(Effector, Arcane Mastery, 10)
chance to launch additional Arcane Missiles.

PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 1.3, 1)
damage on beginnings of their turns for 3 turns.

PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 2.9, 1)
damage.
This ability ends caster's turn.
A word of darkness that causes 510 Shadow
PowerRange(Effector, Spell, 0.6, 1)
damage each turn for 5 turns.
